Package common.bounds

Interface Bounds

public interface Bounds
Represents two bounding values, e.g. endpoints of a horizontal or vertical line segment.

  • Field Summary

    • common

      static Bounds common​(Bounds... all)
      Determine the common bounds for a set of bounds
      Parameters:
      all - set of bounds
      Returns:
      new instance of Bounds that represents the least common bounds for all

    • allOverlap

      static boolean allOverlap​(Bounds... all)

    • getBin

      default int getBin​(double value, int nBins)
      Determine a discrete bin number for a value, given nBins for range; useful for histograms, color scales, value windows, etc.
      Parameters:
      value - value
      nBins - number of bins for the range
      Returns:
      the bin, if value is within range, -1 otherwise

    • getFractionBetween

      default double getFractionBetween​(double value)
      Get fraction between bounds for value
      Parameters:
      value - value
      Returns:
      fraction between bounds endpoints, or Dval if value not within bounds
